TopicTitle: Hovercar Race (Kerbal foundery) Just For Fun NO REWARD!

Articles.Content:
This is a race to the desert to the south east of the KSC (Kerbal Space Center) is most be in the Rule:

Cheats:

Only Infinite Fuel (You don't have to use this if you want a challange)

--------------------

Engine:

Stock Engines, karbonite and karbonite+ or near future Propulsion (For a Extra Challenge )

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For hover: (Must over not fly)

Kerbal foundry: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...ors-and-tracks

If you want a very Low Flying VOTL Will be aloud but you must show a video to qualify

Mods Allowed:

Kerbanite+: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93054-0-90-Karbonite-Plus-%28K-%29-A-Karbonite-Expansion%21-0-3-0-2014-12-16?highlight=anti+grav

[h=2]Karbonite:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87335-24-2-Karbonite-Ongoing-Dev-and-Discussion?highlight=Kerbanite[/h][h=2]Near Future Technologies: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-90-0-25-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFPropulsion-0-90%29?highlight=anti+grav[/h]

Tweak Scale: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...-28-20-00-UTC)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Points System and Ranking:

This Game is rated on points and the more points the lower the higher the ranking

1 minute = 60 points

1 Second = 1 point

using Electrical Engines = -120 points

Low Flying VTOL = -240

1.Not Recorded

2.Not Recorded

3.Not Recorded

4.Not Recorded

5.Not Recorded

6.Not Recorded

7.Not Recorded

8.Not Recorded

9.Not Recorded

10.Not Recorded

Alco: Not Recorded

This is just for fun ThereIsNoReward!!!!!

Welcome to the Forum!

We see a challenge as a first post so much... please don't take anything said harshly, it is not intended that way!

Firstly, it is obvious you haven't read the Challenge Submission Guide

Secondly, you haven't supplied your attempt...

and Thirdly, you haven't checked to see if anyone has posted a similar challenge! This was actually done (a little differently) a little while ago over on this thread (Well, very differently in this case, but what I mean to say is it is a fairly common challenge, usually started off with an argument about if it's possible or not!)

A few hints for your challenge - Spelling, Grammar and punctuation, all reasonably important to avoid arguments about what you mean about something - simple is easier

Why have you put your name on there when you don't yet have an attempt?

Cheats:

Only Infinite Fuel (You don't have to use this if you want a challange)

Yep, we want a challenge, that's why we're visiting the challenges page Most people ban everything on the F12 menu...
